en.importModalDesc: Provide a unique name for the new level and upload your CSV data files.
en.errorNoSupportedFiles: No supported CSV files found. Ensure filenames are correct (e.g., kanji.csv).
en.errorNoFolderSelected: No files selected. Please select your CSV files.
en.errorNoValidData: No valid data could be parsed from the provided files. Please check the file contents.
en.dictionarySubtitle: Enter a Japanese or English word to search.
en.dictionaryNotice: Dictionary results are provided by JDict and Jotoba.
en.noResultsSubtitle: Try checking your spelling or using a different term.
en.searchTimeout: Search timed out. Please try again.
en.searchError: Could not fetch results. Please try again.
en.searchRateLimitError: Too many requests. Please wait a moment.
en.searchServerError: Server is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
en.searchNetworkError: Network connection failed. Please check your internet connection.
en.errorLoadLevelBody: Please try refreshing or select another level.
en.errorLoadContentBody: The content for this section could not be loaded. Please try again or select another tab.
en.errorContentNotAvailableBody: This content ('{tabName}') was not included in the import for the custom level '{levelName}'.
en.errorDeleteDefaultLevel: The default level cannot be deleted.
en.confirmDeleteLevel: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the '{level}' level and all its progress? This action cannot be undone.
en.errorDeleteLevel: An error occurred while trying to delete the level.
en.notesPlaceholder:
Type your personal notes, mnemonics, or reminders here...

(Ctrl/Cmd + S to save and close)
